identification.description: A structure used to uniquely identify a loan covenant obligation category            type (e.g. affirmative, negative, or financial) based on a scheme.

codes.description: A covenant requiring a borrower/issuer to affirmatively perform an action                    or maintain a specified condition.
A covenant based on a borrower's/issuer's financial                    performance.
A covenant forbidding a borrower/issuer from performing a certain action                    or creating a specified condition.
